DOC.criteria: Anyone undergoing cardiac catheterization suspect coronary artery disease age 18 . 1 . Patients currently longterm antibiotic stop least 2 week prior provide stool sample . 2 . Patients chronic laxative stop least 2 week prior stool collection . 3 . Patients probiotic stop 2 week prior give stool sample ( yogurt ok ) . 4 . Patients unable provide stool sample Mayo Clinic utilize Fed Ex overnight mail . 5 . Patients previous Coronary Artery Bypass Grafting procedure 6 . Patients colostomy 7 . Transplant Patients
